verses.kjv: In the end of the sabbath, as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week, came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre.
verses.web: Now after the Sabbath, as it began to dawn on the first day of the week, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary came to see the tomb.
verses.ct: After the Sabbath ended, as Sunday morning began to dawn, Mary Magdalene and the other Mary went to visit the tomb.

verses.kjv: And, behold, there was a great earthquake: for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven, and came and rolled back the stone from the door, and sat upon it.
verses.web: Behold, there was a great earthquake, for an angel of the Lord descended from the sky, and came and rolled away the stone from the door, and sat on it.
verses.ct: Suddenly there was a violent earthquake, because an angel of the Lord came down from heaven, rolled the stone away from the entrance, and sat on it.

verses.kjv: His countenance was like lightning, and his raiment white as snow:
verses.web: His appearance was like lightning, and his clothing white as snow.
verses.ct: His face blazed like lightning, and his clothes were as white as snow.

verses.kjv: And for fear of him the keepers did shake, and became as dead men.
verses.web: For fear of him, the guards shook, and became like dead men.
verses.ct: The guards were so terrified of him that they shook uncontrollably and collapsed like dead men.

verses.kjv: And the angel answered and said unto the women, Fear not ye: for I know that ye seek Jesus, which was crucified.
verses.web: The angel answered the women, “Don’t be afraid, for I know that you seek Jesus, who has been crucified.
verses.ct: The angel spoke to the women: "Don't be afraid. I know you're looking for Jesus, who was crucified."

verses.kjv: He is not here: for he is risen, as he said. Come, see the place where the Lord lay.
verses.web: He is not here, for he has risen, just like he said. Come, see the place where the Lord was lying.
verses.ct: "He isn't here — he has risen, just as he said he would! Come, see the place where the Lord was lying."

verses.kjv: And go quickly, and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead; and, behold, he goeth before you into Galilee; there shall ye see him: lo, I have told you.
verses.web: Go quickly and tell his disciples, ‘He has risen from the dead, and behold, he goes before you into Galilee; there you will see him.’ Behold, I have told you.”
verses.ct: "Now go quickly and tell his disciples: 'He has risen from the dead and is going ahead of you to Galilee. You will see him there.' Remember, I've told you this."

verses.kjv: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy; and did run to bring his disciples word.
verses.web: They departed quickly from the tomb with fear and great joy, and ran to bring his disciples word.
verses.ct: The women hurried away from the tomb, trembling with fear yet overwhelmed with joy, and ran to tell his disciples.

verses.kjv: And as they went to tell his disciples, behold, Jesus met them, saying, All hail. And they came and held him by the feet, and worshipped him.
verses.web: As they went to tell his disciples, behold, Jesus met them, saying, “Rejoice!” They came and took hold of his feet, and worshiped him.
verses.ct: As they were on their way, Jesus himself met them and said, "Rejoice!" They rushed to him, grabbed hold of his feet, and worshiped him.

verses.kjv: Then said Jesus unto them, Be not afraid: go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee, and there shall they see me.
verses.web: Then Jesus said to them, “Don’t be afraid. Go tell my brothers that they should go into Galilee, and there they will see me.”
verses.ct: Jesus told them, "Don't be afraid. Go tell my brothers to head to Galilee — they will see me there."

verses.kjv: Now when they were going, behold, some of the watch came into the city, and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done.
verses.web: Now while they were going, behold, some of the guards came into the city, and told the chief priests all the things that had happened.
verses.ct: While the women were on their way, some of the guards went into the city and reported everything that had happened to the chief priests.

verses.kjv: And when they were assembled with the elders, and had taken counsel, they gave large money unto the soldiers,
verses.web: When they were assembled with the elders, and had taken counsel, they gave a large amount of silver to the soldiers,
verses.ct: The chief priests met with the elders and came up with a plan. They paid the soldiers a large sum of money

verses.kjv: Saying, Say ye, His disciples came by night, and stole him away while we slept.
verses.web: saying, “Say that his disciples came by night, and stole him away while we slept.
verses.ct: and told them, "Say that his disciples came during the night and stole the body while you were sleeping."

verses.kjv: And if this come to the governor’s ears, we will persuade him, and secure you.
verses.web: If this comes to the governor’s ears, we will persuade him and make you free of worry.”
verses.ct: "If the governor hears about this, we'll handle him and make sure you stay out of trouble."

verses.kjv: So they took the money, and did as they were taught: and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day.
verses.web: So they took the money and did as they were told. This saying was spread abroad among the Jews, and continues until today.
verses.ct: So the soldiers took the money and did what they were told. This story has been widely circulated among the Jewish people to this day.

verses.kjv: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee, into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them.
verses.web: But the eleven disciples went into Galilee, to the mountain where Jesus had sent them.
verses.ct: The 11 remaining disciples traveled to Galilee, to the mountain where Jesus had told them to go.

verses.kjv: And when they saw him, they worshipped him: but some doubted.
verses.web: When they saw him, they bowed down to him, but some doubted.
verses.ct: When they saw him, they worshiped him — though some still had doubts.

verses.kjv: And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.
verses.web: Jesus came to them and spoke to them, saying, “All authority has been given to me in heaven and on earth.
verses.ct: Jesus came closer and said to them, "All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me."

verses.kjv: Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost:
verses.web: Go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit,
verses.ct: "So go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit,"

verses.kjv: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
verses.web: teaching them to observe all things that I commanded you. Behold, I am with you always, even to the end of the age.” Amen.
verses.ct: "and teaching them to follow everything I have commanded you. And know this: I am with you always, to the very end of the age." Amen.
